entry.title: Extension for BIP-0070 to support recurring payments
entry.summary: One suggestion for managing payments is to schedule recurring payments at regular intervals, but with the ability to pause or cancel them at any time. Merchants may also be able to request subscriptions with the option to pause or cancel. Richard Kohl, founder of PikaPay, offers a service to send bitcoins through Twitter and can be contacted through email, Twitter, or phone.
